review: just completed the game and 100 achievement it pretty short game since i can 100 in just 14 hours but still a great 14 hours feel like a interactive book not much hard puzzles but still fun to play the only thing is that if you want to 100 the game you have to unlock all achievement at one playthrough
this game is so unbelievably underrated the art is beautiful and the story is compelling i loved every second of it

one of the best adventure style games ive played with a heartfelt and interesting story line beautiful art style and addicting gameplay took me around 11 hours total but averages at about six hours of rich and fascinating stories
very cute game filled with lots of puzzles and lore
now this game is good i love the puzzles and the characters i had so much fun doing the puzzles and going out on this fantasy world that tove has stumbled into ill give this game a 710
i loved this gamethe gameplay the story the art the puzzles
i cried while playing this i love rki so much its stupid
fun cozy game with easy to understand controls do get stuck sometimes because unsure what to do or where to go but i was able to figure it out on my and if needed 3 times with the help of yt

the game itself wonderful story beautiful art and fun gameplay the glitches incredibly annoying especially one that prevents one of the final achievements from being earned however i had an absolute blast playing the game so this still lands on the side of recommend but with the caveat that there are glitches to be aware of before you buy

im still early on in the game but i can already feel that its going to take a special place in my heart it is such a sweet and well made story so far the atmosphere is impeccable and the exploration is super fun i do wish tove could run in a straight line more often but thats alright its whimsical with a touch of danger i think this will be excellent to play in the wintertime
this is a second time i purchase the game and the error still there i cant move the character  seriously when you gonna fix the problem i really want to play this game  please fix it

its a nice game but does drag a bit come chapter 3 being able to skip cut scenes and transition animations climbing is a big one would help a lot a little more unique animation for the ending to make it match the dialogue would be nice as well
i like it

a strong and sad story about a girl protagonist it brought me to tears once you get the hang of the puzzles its easy to progress through and fun perhaps its best to play in the winter to get a feel for the nordic atmosphere

beautifully and enchanting puzzle game which is kinda extra fun to play as a scandinavian who get excited at the correct pronounciation of names loved it from start to finish and i got so involved in the story wish i could play it again without knowing the story
uma histria linda sobre inocncia amor perda e luto com arte lindssima e puzzles divertidos

410 to be honest i loved what this was going for story seemed cool and the art style was unique however ive ended up uninstalling after 11 hours as the puzzles are infuriating at times there are times when the puzzles glitch out and dont work and overall it felt like a chore to get through it is the perfect model for a go here get this sort of game massive disappointment
the art work and the story of the game itself is just outstanding

its a nice game but i just cant really get into this kind of game  i believe its point and click puzzle game at its core but the way it set up its puzzles are endless back tracking  it really become tedious really fast plus the average animation are unskippable player are force to watch through all the animation in every fail attempt me personally i fail a lot   a 610 for me but its a really great way to get into different culture and get to know their folklore
chapters 1 and 2 were absolutely lovely but chapter 3 is just too buggy for me to want to complete the game  all in all it is a beautiful game worth checking out

nota bad game mediocre story but had fun with some of the puzzles addictive when you find out the solutions frustrated when missed some of the obfuscated key pieces not recommended because you wont miss anything if you dont play it
very interesting gameplay

beautifully designed and crafted game very atmospheric and the sound and music makes this a really immersive game i enjoyed the mechanics of the game the only downside is not being able to manually save and go back to previous chapters in the game to finish all the achievements

a story of family love loss and overcoming trauma all guided by puzzlespointandclick adventure i loved it and recommend it  difficulty easy 100  achievement difficulty easymedium graphics very welldone cartoon music good

its decent some good puzzles not much moon logic but because of the way camera angles work you will have to occasionally do some pixel hunting  the story was not bad but i wasnt particularly drawn to it having to watch the protagonist slowly spider crawl up and down walls over and over was a drag  word to the wise theres a sprint button i didnt figure this out until the final act

ive played through this a few times now and have enjoyed it each time the required backtracking is handled really well and there is only one portion of the game where it gets annoying but thats also because i fail to pay enough attention each time ive done it the story is solid and the world is fun to run around in aswith the characters the soundtrack is also beautiful
lovely game beautiful
such a great game  good story and just the right difficulty
great story line and challenging puzzles love this and very cozy game
this game is so much fun i love the puzzles and the storyline and the inspiration is very unique

really love this game calm but also adventurous and a little scary at times the puzzles were fun and made you think easy but still challenging the plot was captivating and the art was beautiful 100 recommend
a cute adventure game with fun clever puzzles and a good story

i loved this game from the amazing atmosphere to the great game play i just wanted to keep playing i wish it was longer with how much i loved it the game was straight forward and the cut scenes were a nice touch highly recommend
great story stylish graphics and satisfying puzzles

beautiful lore based on nordic folklore beautiful art and a heartfelt story if you are looking for a short and sweet single player story experience this is definitely one of the good ones the story can probably be completed in under 10 hours but you can get a few more hours seeing all there is to see
i got gifted this game a while ago and i regret not playing it sooner was honestly really fun to stream to my friends
a sweet story about family and folklore with engaging puzzles the switchup in chapter 3 worked really well for the narrative and the gameplay
its a good game
a lively animated pointandclick that is not too hard but has an overwhelming second act

beautifully designed game with a perfect narrative its one of those games where you feel like your being told a true story like the lore is serious and meaningful and important to know its very easy to become immersed in the world and the puzzles suit the tone of the game the game controls are a delight to work with and it is such a satisfying game to play
whimsical
i really liked the game and all the unique characters  especially the tree of many my only critique is i found the mechanic for using objects to be a bit annoying but other than that i loved it
a puzzle game with an emotional and heartfelt family drama wrapped in dark nordic mythology beautiful music environments and story
really fun game the puzzles are not so easy and not too difficult either fun chill game overall i would recommend it
this game has such a beautiful story nice graphic and music i like the puzzle not too difficult but not too easy
loved this game  beautiful art touching story well done puzzles that are not too hard nor too easy  very satisfying to solve and the story kept me engaged
emotional game set in a cold and nordic environment quite fun to play and solve puzzles had fun playing recommended for indie games lovers

amazing story artwork and music the storyline was really easy to follow and made me tear up at the end i will admit i used a guide to help me with the puzzles because im honestly too smooth brain for it rip but im more of a storyline person anyways so it didnt take away the enjoyment the game didnt take too long roughly around 7 to 8 hours if you use a guide from the very beginning
very interesting game amazing art

lovely lovely music art and story had a blast playing this perfect wintery game to play this december  the puzzles were very well constructed wished there was a manual saveload feature i had a few instances where the savingicon would appear but when i reloaded the game my last autosave was from before i had completed a puzzle i had already done but anyway i would love a sequel to this i fell in love with this world and these characters
i found the gameplay fairly limited story story clickobviousnextstep repeat i love the art style but id rather just watch this as a movie
a cute little game with nice puzzles and an engaging story

i dont think words can express how great this game was for me the art is beautiful the art and puzzles are well done and its just incredibly enjoyable and easygoing i can see myself coming back and playing this game again in the future
great adventure puzzle with a good story
played mostly on other platforms it was good i cried
i feel like a complete idiot because i cant figure out the wolf statue puzzle
its a good game support these devs
a simple puzzle game with great art style and beautiful story highly recommend 8510

this was such a charming game if you enjoy solving puzzles and want a characterdriven story i highly recommend no choices though a lot of moments really made me feel like our main character is based off of a real person especially since the writers really understand the sort of fuzzy easily manipulated nature of childhood memories
beware of softlocks the game softlocked 6 hours in completely ruining my save file not going to be doing it all over again after that
this was delightful cool story and setting and the puzzles were fair and challenging great stuff

beautiful story and game if youre interested in a simple puzzle game in a unique world this is solid you can put a little bit of time in this game but its really one to take your time and enjoy the story line is great and really jumps into loss forgiveness and grieving great job polygon

i really enjoyed this games more atypical graphics the story was great i couldnt get through some parts for a long time but i dont take that as a negative the controls are fine i dont remember much about the codriver i was a bit bothered by some long scenes in the story you cant skip them and they could be much shorter still 710
cute game with an interesting story  the save function isnt very useful but the game also isnt super long  it wasnt too much trouble for me to get all the achievements which was pretty nice

rki is an incredible game with a good story but what i liked most about the game were the puzzles and the characters the art is beautiful and very colorful i had a lot of fun playing this game i got stuck on some puzzles due to my lack of attention
very sweet and homely adventure game has some clever puzzles which are easily to approach but not overly obvious sweet story centred around parenthood and rescuing your sibling worth every penny
i really liked this game the style creatures and story really sucked me in cute  at times emotional
rki more like lki

fun little classicstyle adventure game short sweet charming lots of neat characters prettyevocative art and environments simple but wellexecuted story probably even better if you are familiar with scandinavian folklore at all unlike me who only has passing knowledge lol puzzles were interesting enough without ever really getting frustrating only real complaint was that the backtracking in chapter 3 sometimes felt like a bit much but overall very good would recommend
cutest antagonist 3

what a great game seriously wellmade interesting and impactful generally a lowstress game but with a meaningful story gameplay is simple but still very welldone you explore and find useful items to put in your inventory then try to find where they can be of use took me 10 hours to finish but it looks like ill need another run to get all the achievements
what a wonderfully emotional adventure i love the story and the game mechanics that allow you to play as two characters puzzles are challenging at times which is also good
i beat this game in one sitting instead of doing homework i think ill do it again tomorrow

amazing game i had a lot of fun playing it despite getting frustrated with some of the puzzles and the story was very beautiful theres something i think everyone can learn from it now id love a rki period bag or at least a plushie  haha
its cute but i did not find it good enough for adults
tomte my little buddy
fantastic game i played this with my finnish wife and she adored the mythology and art we had a great time it was my first click and point game and i had a splendid time

the instances of folklore and foreign languages is fun but so much of it is included without given context that i found myself having to stop dialogue and go to google constantly to find out what was being said or referenced in hindsight this definitely caused the initial part of the game to feel super dragged out it took me roughly 2 hours just to finally get to the actual game
so amazing wooooooooo

i havent played a more engaging puzzle game the storytelling is fantastic the art and soundtrack are phenomenal if you like games that make you think and force you to backtrack to find missing pieces to different puzzles i highly recommend roki im not finished with the game but im already planning out my second playthrough  simply a stellar game

love this game i didnt understand it at first from the unknown language barrier on my part and just thought it was some cutesy game but there was more to it i had to figure out in my head how to do certain task to which i love challenges the story line reminded me of my own personal life which also made me emotional and the puzzles were somewhat difficult but not too bad i went into this game not knowing what i was doing and ended up loving it wonderful would play again
beautiful artwork fun puzzles rich story a relax game you can play at your own pace i had fun
bit slow paced but great world very pretty and the story is intriguing uzzls also arent mind breaking or pixel hunts but mostly logical ive gotten stuck as time or two though
good
this has one of the worst interaction systems and unchangeable keybinding settings

wow what a beautiful game the story is so unbelievably touching i teared up a bunch and may or may not have cried throughout the whole ending art is beautiful gameplay is simple and smooth puzzles will scratch your brain def recommend for a short but very worth it experience  side note played it all on steam deck handheld and it was perfect

a heartfelt adventure with a compelling narrative and distinctive visual style i feel however it unfortunately falls a little short with its game mechanics becoming overly simplistic with its puzzles still a game i would recommend but probably only on a discount

45 most of the game is really good i did get stuck in the scenery now and then my only complaint is the very tedious boring ending that was just clicking and running and having to watch all the credits to get the ending you want after all that puzzles were enjoyable will be replaying to get a missed achievement and find hidden objects art style very beautiful and fun i enjoyed the setting and the characters as well
good game with nice animations and a fun world to explore
not enough people know about this game the only thing i dont like is that some puzzles are very confusing and way too broad so youll have to watch a playthrough at some point
besides the wonderful art and beautiful soundtrack the story of this game will also stay with me for a long time amazing experience truly cant praise the music enough
nice game very casual and slowpaced  atmoshpere is great and i like that nordic mythology
lovely adventure game for a chill play
best adventure game ive ever played and ive played them all
cute puzzle game  some parts were slow moving cuz  of the climbing

this game is amazing the graphics are incredible the music fits the vibe perfectly and the gameplay is very fun the world landscapes are breathtaking the puzzles are challenging without being impossible the storyline is both sad and so very hopeful if you enjoy cosy logic games you will probably enjoy rki
fun

loved this i was in love with the story and how the game progressed through it the integration of some norse lore i believe is also something that pulled me in to the game would recommend for those looking for a game with a good story and very playable gameplay

another scandi folklore puzzle game but about as different from bramble the mountian king as you can get more like a point n click this has a sister trying to rescue her younger brother from the clutches of an ultimately sympathetic villain the puzzles involve dimension swapping and working together with the girls dad to progress further into the story deserving of its reviews its lighter cartoonish nature makes it more universally appealing i really enjoyed this
very cute game puzzles arent too difficult but theres enough to collect and explore to remain engaging throughout the ending is very sweet as well 3
the game is so enveloping with its charming graphics and music that i dont even mind that im stuck and keep revisiting the same locations multiple times content warning loss of parentfamily member
cozy game and beautiful graphics but in the end it got a little bit boring would recommend it tho
i really liked this game especially the style and environment very fun game recommend
loved the fairytale heart of roki i enjoyed every minute  especially the family flashback scenes and the well
just like reading a fairy tale some puzzles are hard and some achievements are easy to miss not a bad game a family story
good graphics fun story highly recomend

this have is really similar to a lot of my favorite games  i enjoyed how the puzzles didnt require a walkthrough in order to figure out the answer the two puzzles that were riddles were easy enough to guess at with the voiceover hints   the story is beautiful and each chapter brings with it new game mechanics  i like games with fairy tales and whimsy
amazing story sound and gameplay loved the 15 hours i put in this game i would recommend to anyone looking for an amazing single player game with great storyline
